DisclosureDefinitionVersion.name: DisclosureDefinitionVersion
DisclosureDefinitionVersion.description: Represents the version information about the disclosure definition.

AuthoringMode.description: Specifies the authoring mode used to launch the disclosure authoring experience.

Description.description: The description of the disclosure definition version.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record.

DisclosureDefinition.description: The name of the disclosure definition associated with the version.

DocumentTemplateGlobalKey.description: The document template global key associated with the DOCX template for the disclosure definition version.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the disclosure definition version is an active version (true) or not (false).

IsCurrentVersion.description: Indicates whether this is the current version of the disclosure definition (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language associated with this record.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.

OmniScriptCnfgApiName.description: The API name of the OmniScript configuration that's associated with the disclosure definition version.

OmniScriptConfiguration.description: The OmniScript configuration that's associated with the disclosure definition version.

VersionNumber.description: The version of the disclosure definition published by the author.
